info.name: Helios Time and Expense Management Experience API v1
info.description:
This API specification document defines the Helios T&E Experience Layer API. The API exposes the following operations
  ## Functional Operations
  * Retrieve Employee Data
  * Submit Expense Claim information for Accounting Document posting 
  * Submit Spend Data information for Spend Analysis
  
## Headers
  * client_id - Generated and provided to the application
  * client_secret - Generated and provided to the application    

## Security

  * This API is protected by the following policies:
    * Client ID Enforcement policy

## Example Endpoint (PROD)
